testimonials.sectionDescription: See how businesses are growing with our solutions, proven results, sustainable growth.

carlos.name: Carlos Mendes
carlos.quote: I was tired of losing sales because I took too long to respond on WhatsApp. CazaTech built an automation that responds in seconds, qualifies the lead, and books the meeting. In the first month, we closed 40% more deals. It's not magic — it's a well-designed process.

ana.name: Ana Paula Silva
ana.quote: Our old website looked nice but didn't sell. They rebuilt everything with conversion in mind: copy, structure, speed. Now the site works 24/7 generating qualified leads. The ROI paid for itself in 3 weeks.

roberto.name: Roberto Santos
roberto.quote: I used to spend hours answering the same WhatsApp questions. Now the bot responds, filters out tire-kickers, and only sends me people ready to buy. My team focuses on what matters: closing deals.

jennifer.name: Jessica Martins
jennifer.quote: We had spreadsheets, separate systems, a total mess. CazaTech integrated everything: CRM, WhatsApp, email, finance. Now we have a complete view of each customer in one place. The team stopped wasting time searching for information.

mariana.name: Mariana Costa
mariana.quote: Our blog never delivered results until they came in. They rewrote the content with SEO and customer journey in mind. In 4 months, we were on Google's first page. Now we get organic leads every day.

fernando.name: Fernando Oliveira
fernando.quote: I thought automation was only for big companies. They built a simple system: customer books via WhatsApp, gets automatic confirmation, and a reminder the day before. Zero no-shows. An investment that pays for itself.
